name: Karl Dickey
text:
Anthony's is a chain of Italian restaurants that originated in South Florida and is expanding into other states. It is their attitude and the way they operate that sets them apart.

This is a very busy pizza spot in downtown Delray, visited mostly by the locals. The staff is incredibly nice and very accommodating. Recently I organized a large party for a friend's birthday and while every other restaurant turned away our business, Anthony's came through and made it work. The staff at this location are great!

I wish they expanded their menu to include pasta, but it is pretty much mostly pizza. Their sauce is very good. I will not go so far to say the best, but it is good and also wish they would stock vegan cheese. This is one reason we end up at Mellow Mushroom down the street more often than Anthony's. They also use Delivery Dudes, so if you want to stay in, you can still gets your Anthony's pizza.

I'll miss listening to Anthony on the radio each week with Paul & "Young Ron", he's an entertaining fellow.
